spec_data.Name: perl-Net-OpenID-Server
spec_data.Description:
This is the Perl API for (the server half of) OpenID, a distributed
identity system based on proving you own a URL, which is then your
identity.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 02:26:33 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Library for building your own OpenID server/provider
